EmailTemplate.name: VMware Forum London follow up.Email
EmailTemplate.subject: VMware Forum Follow up
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
It was great to meet and spend some time with you at VMware Forum on 2nd May – thanks for taking the time to come by and see us. As a follow-up to the show, I wanted to point you at several resources designed to dive deeper into the ways VMTurbo will dramatically improve how you control and automate your virtual data center.
- Our Trial Download <http://bit.ly/QzvQgM> - Our online Evaluation Resource Center <http://bit.ly/Yz66Yv> - This technical whitepaper <http://bit.ly/10xbpFp>
We will be following up with you shortly to understand your priorities and interest in learning more about VMTurbo. If you would like to set up some time to get a more in-depth, tailored demonstration of our solution, please let us know here <http://bit.ly/145VraT>.
Kind regards Alec Kemp Director Systems Engineering
